title: Baker Mayfield passes his physical and is officially a Carolina Panther
description:
Robby Anderson clarifies his opinion on the Panthers quarterback situation, Sam Acho lists his top 5 inside linebackers and this All-Pro safety thinks he has the best quarterback in the league.
